The image was flagged as part of Faceboo: s efforts to combat false news and misinformation on its News Feed.
A reverse: image search led to a 2014 report on a Quran recitation competition organized by the Islamic State in Aleppo, confirming the origin of the image.
An Arabic: speaking AFP journalist confirmed from the video that the girl was reciting chapter 112 of the Quran, debunking the claim that she was a Christian being forced into sexual slavery.
